age.Description: Age of the participant at time of testing

physical_match_accuracy.Description: Accuracy rate in the matching condition of the Physical block

physical_mismatch_accuracy.Description: Accuracy rate in the mismatching condition of the Physical block

imagery_match_accuracy.Description: Accuracy rate in the matching condition of the Imagery block

imagery_mismatch_accuracy.Description: Accuracy rate in the mismatching condition of the Imagery block

literal_match_accuracy.Description: Accuracy rate in the matching condition of the Literal block

literal_mismatch_accuracy.Description: Accuracy rate in the mismatching condition of the Literal block

metaphorical_match_accuracy.Description: Accuracy rate in the matching condition of the Metaphorical block

metaphorical_mismatch_accuracy.Description: Accuracy rate in the matching condition of the Metaphorical block

suis_tot.Description: Total score of the Spontaneous Use of Imagery Scale - SUIS; Nelis et al. 2014

vviq_tot.Description: Total score of the Vividness Of Visual Imagery Questionnaire - VVIQ; Marks 1973

mit_clock.Description: Total score of the Clock task included in the Mental Imagery Test - MIT; Di Nuovo et al. 2014

mit_cube.Description: Total score of the Clock task included in the Mental Imagery Test - MIT; Di Nuovo et al. 2014

mit_parts.Description: Total score of the Subtraction of Parts task included in the Mental Imagery Test - MIT; Di Nuovo et al. 2014

mit_map.Description: Total score of the Map task included in the Mental Imagery Test - MIT; Di Nuovo et al. 2014

mit_tot.Description: Total score of the Mental Imagery Test - MIT; Di Nuovo et al. 2014

vocabulary_tot.Description: Total score of the Vocabulary task of the Weschler Adult Intelligence Scale–Revised - WAIS-R; Orsini & Laicardi 1997
